duties_responsibilities.duty: Work and resolve all back-end high dollar, complex, and aged physician billing denials as assigned.
Review and complete continuous daily work queue volume for related denials.
Respond to all customer service inquiries in regards to physician billing-related patient accounts.
Work on claim rejections due to physician billing-related issues returned by the payor preventing claims submission.
Research systems for active insurance coverages for self-pay balances beyond set thresholds to prevent missed cash collection opportunity.
Assist in the development of reporting mechanisms to identify trends and track so that education can be performed to reduce and/or resolve high dollar/high volume values.
Provide and promote ideas geared toward process improvements within the Central Billing Office.
Independently work on the resolution of complex claims issues, denials, and appeals.
Assist in the mentoring and training of new and existing A/R staff as required following the training program set forth.

education_certification.credential: Associates degree or equivalent experience. Billing Certification Preferred – Epic Resolute Professional/Hospital Billing Admin (Proficiency, Proficiency with Honors, or Certification)
